title: Carlton Midstrength
text:
Carlton Midstrength (or Carlton Mid) is an Australian <a href="lager">lager</a>, brewed by <a href="Carlton%20%26amp%3B%20United%20Beverages">Carlton & United Beverages</a>, a subsidiary of the <a href="Foster%27s%20Group">Foster's Group</a>. The beer is currently one of the three mid-strength beers available, which is the second largest beer segment in <a href="Australia">Australia</a>.
The alcohol content is 3.0%, and they are available in 375ml Bottles, 375ml Cans which are 0.9 standard drink and 750ml Bottle and they are 1.8 standard drink. Bittering hops and hop extracts are combined to give the hop-character like tastes in the drink.
